effect_entries.effect:
Used outside of battle
:   Doubles the wild Pokémon encounter rate.
effect_entries.short_effect: Doubles the wild Pokémon encounter rate.

flavor_text_entries.text:
白い　ガラスで　できている
おもちゃの　笛。

A lovely toy flute to admire.
It’s made from white glass.
Flauto giocattolo fatto di vetro bianco.
Una flauta de juguete de cristal blanco.
Un jouet en forme de flûte en verre blanc.

しろい　ガラスで　できている
おもちゃの　ふえ。

A toy flute made from white glass.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.

A toy flute made from white glass.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.

Jouet en forme de flûte en verre
blanc. Les amateurs en donnent
un bon prix.

A white flute made from blown glass.
Its melody makes wild Pokémon more
likely to appear.

A white flute made from blown glass.
Its melody makes wild Pokémon more
likely to appear.

A white flute made from blown glass.
Its melody makes wild Pokémon more
likely to appear.

A white glass flute.
When blown, it makes wild POKéMON
more likely to appear.

A glass flute that
lures wild POKéMON.

A glass flute that
lures wild POKéMON.
